title: 【配置Forge开发】请求帮助
author: 滑稽主教
txt_content:
今天我配置forge的时候，发现出现以下问题：
Could not find net.minecraftforge:forge:1.16.1-32.0.47_mapped_snapshot_20200514-1.16.
Searched in the following locations:
  - https://files.minecraftforge.net ... t_20200514-1.16.pom
  - https://files.minecraftforge.net ... t_20200514-1.16.jar
  - file:/C:/Users/*********/.gradle/caches/forge_gradle/bundeled_repo/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.16.1-32.0.47_mapped_snapshot_20200514-1.16/forge-1.16.1-32.0.47_mapped_snapshot_20200514-1.16.pom
  - file:/C:/Users/*********/.gradle/caches/forge_gradle/bundeled_repo/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.16.1-32.0.47_mapped_snapshot_20200514-1.16/forge-1.16.1-32.0.47_mapped_snapshot_20200514-1.16.jar
  - https://libraries.minecraft.net/ ... t_20200514-1.16.jar
  - https://repo.maven.apache.org/ma ... t_20200514-1.16.pom
  - https://repo.maven.apache.org/ma ... t_20200514-1.16.jar
Required by:
    project :

Possible solution:
- Declare repository providing the artifact, see the documentation at https://docs.gradle.org/current/ ... g_repositories.html

重试了很多遍后还是不行，我把它的网站打开，结果它显示404错误，有两个打开成功，但是并没有
minecraftforge/forge/1.16.1-32.0.47_mapped_snapshot_20200514-1.16/forge-1.16.1-32.0.47_mapped_snapshot_20200514-1.16.jar
，在线等，急!

replies.author: 天辉胡萝卜
replies.txt_content:
重新执行
git clone https://github.com/MinecraftForge/MinecraftForge.git --single-branch --branch 1.16.x复制代码
拉取新文件呢？
